overview: “Skip oversees Voyant’s technology strategy and advanced development initiatives. Prior to Voyant, he was architect, lead developer and founder of the Gossamer Group, LLC, an IT consultancy for Fortune 500 financial services firms. While at Gossamer, Skip led design and development efforts for one of the financial services industry’s first SOA-based federated identity management solutions. Skip received a B.S. in Mathematical Sciences from The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, and an M.S. in Computer Science from The University of Texas at Austin.” (Source: Voyant)
